name: Ben Schenker's Page
body:
### I'm Ben
I am a software engineer at GE Capital in New Orleans.  

### Operation Spark
I've been a volunteer with [Operation Spark](https://operationspark.org/) since 2014 teaching in their web development bootcamps for local opportunity youth.

### Career
While earning a degree in electrical engineering from Cooper Union, I fell in love with software.  I started with C and Python, but now I focus on web development in Javascript and Java these days. Checkout [my Github profile](https://github.com/benschenker) for more details.

### Blogging
I occasionally blog at [ Silicon Spatula](http://siliconspatula.com/) with my old friend David about tech and food.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
